revised_title: Mercury Mining and Extraction Techniques in Friuli
tldr: The author describes the process of mining and extracting mercury from the mines of Friuli, Italy. He explains the methods used to separate mercury from the surrounding earth and the environmental impact on the workers, who often suffer from paralysis and mercury poisoning. The author also discusses the use of water-powered engines and the transportation of wood for the mines.
